import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get receipt by its operation id.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2/pix/receipt/by-operation/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Enter the pix payment's operation ID below and execute to get its receipt. Should use <b>/operations/{id}/receipt</b> path.

## Request

All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
